duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide engineering support to various areas, including media preparation, harvest capture and clarification, and manufacturing support equipment.
Perform systems and P&ID walkdowns, commission equipment, and provide Equipment Turnover Packages (ETOPs)
Provide process engineering support for clean water systems, CIP, COP, SIP, CTU and pharmaceutical process equipment
Write and execute Installation Qualification (IQ), Operational Qualification (OQ), Performance Qualification (PQ), cycle development protocols
Assist the project lead in the delivery of scheduled executions, project management processes, and promote cGMP and regulatory compliance into assigned projects.
Review and modification of standard operating procedures (SOPs) and validation protocols for various equipment
Document, monitor, and report on project deliverables and manage project documentation such as protocols, data packages, reports, and process trends.

education_certification.credential: BS degree or higher in chemical engineering or a related engineering or scientific discipline, or significant related experience
